text: - Are you excited by the thing

that many people

because they say, look,
if you travel 1% the speed

we'll be dead before we get there, right?
And I think that it's much easier,

and therefore, when they
write their science fiction

they're too impatient, right?

We're not gonna go faster
than the speed of light,

and once you do that,

then the stars are much
closer, effectively, right?

And then what's a
hundred-year trip, right?

I don't know.

And so, yeah, no, I think
